actions.committee: House Committee on Ways and Means
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Ways and Means.

official_title: A bill to provide for the conservation of energy by amending the Internal Revenue Code of 1954 to allow a refundable tax credit for certain building insulation and heating improvements.

summary.text: Allows a tax credit under the Internal Revenue Code for building insulation and heating improvements for the taxable year up to $1000 to individuals, small business corporations, and estates and trusts. Terminates the availability of this tax credit for taxable years after December 31, 1978.

titles.title: A bill to provide for the conservation of energy by amending the Internal Revenue Code of 1954 to allow a refundable tax credit for certain building insulation and heating improvements.
